alert.note: Alert for North Cass; North Itasca (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 30 at 5:13PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF WEST CENTRAL ITASCA AND NORTHERN CASS COUNTIES THROUGH 545 PM CDT... At 512 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Lake Winnibigoshish, or 32 miles east of Bemidji, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of west central Itasca and northern Cass Counties, including the following locations... Max and Cut Foot Sioux Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.
